Source.Name: psutils
Source.Description: PSUtils is a suite of utilities for manipulating PostScript documents produced according to the Document Structuring Conventions. It is possible to select and rearrange pages, including arrangement into signatures for booklet printing, and page merging for n-up printing.

Package.Name: psutils
Package.Description: PSUtils is a suite of utilities for manipulating PostScript documents produced according to the Document Structuring Conventions. It is possible to select and rearrange pages, including arrangement into signatures for booklet printing, and page merging for n-up printing.
